channel.title: I Really Need Your Help Guys!
channel.description:
My server was fine. Now it logs me out saying im already logged in. When I run the server it says:
Exception in thread "Thread 0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(server.java:151) at java.lang.Thread.run (Unknown Source)
Please help me I'd be very grateful thank you very much.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 12:40:38 PM[/size][hr]This is server.java 151 :
connectingHost.startsWith("207.210.78.41") ||
Must I change that ip to mine?

item.title: I Really Need Your Help Guys!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

ermm…I don’t know then, how about you delete the character you made on the server and make another one, if the same thing happens then I don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: I Really Need Your Help Guys!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Did you add that tut for to make the server anti-hack or its a tut from frell I think. So if you added that tut then you will always get logged out everytime and it will not let you back in.
